description: This is only used through the Amazon Web Services console during sign-up to associate your WhatsApp Business Account to your Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: signupCallback
parameters.description: Contains the callback access token. The access token for your WhatsApp Business Account. The accessToken value is provided by Meta.

nested_params.name: accessToken
nested_params.description: The access token for your WhatsApp Business Account. The accessToken value is provided by Meta.

parameters.name: setupFinalization
parameters.description: A JSON object that contains the phone numbers and WhatsApp Business Account to link to your account. An Amazon Web Services access token generated by WhatsAppSignupCallback and used by WhatsAppSetupFinalization. An array of WabaPhoneNumberSetupFinalization objects containing the details of each phone number associated with the WhatsApp Business Account. (dict) --- The registration details for a linked phone number. The unique identifier of the originating phone number associated with the media. Phone number identifiers are formatted as phone-number-id-01234567890123456789012345678901. Use GetLinkedWhatsAppBusinessAccount to find a phone number's id. The PIN to use for two-step verification. To reset your PIN follow the directions in Updating PIN in the WhatsApp Business Platform Cloud API Reference. dataLocalizationRegion (string) --- The two letter ISO region for the location of where Meta will store data. Australia AU Indonesia ID India IN Japan JP Singapore SG South Korea KR Germany DE Switzerland CH United Kingdom GB Brazil BR Bahrain BH South Africa ZA United Arab Emirates AE Canada CA tags (list) --- An array of key and value pair tags. (dict) --- The tag for a resource. The tag key. value (string) --- The tag value. phoneNumberParent (string) --- Used to add a new phone number to an existing WhatsApp Business Account. This field can't be used when the waba field is present. waba (dict) --- Used to create a new WhatsApp Business Account and add a phone number. This field can't be used when the phoneNumberParent field is present. id (string) --- The ID of the linked WhatsApp Business Account, formatted as waba-01234567890123456789012345678901. eventDestinations (list) --- The event destinations for the linked WhatsApp Business Account. (dict) --- Contains information on the event destination. The ARN of the event destination. roleArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to import phone numbers and write events. tags (list) --- An array of key and value pair tags. value (string) --- The tag value.

nested_params.name: associateInProgressToken
nested_params.description: An Amazon Web Services access token generated by WhatsAppSignupCallback and used by WhatsAppSetupFinalization.

nested_params.name: phoneNumbers
nested_params.description: An array of WabaPhoneNumberSetupFinalization objects containing the details of each phone number associated with the WhatsApp Business Account.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The unique identifier of the originating phone number associated with the media. Phone number identifiers are formatted as phone-number-id-01234567890123456789012345678901. Use GetLinkedWhatsAppBusinessAccount to find a phone number's id.

nested_params.name: twoFactorPin
nested_params.description: The PIN to use for two-step verification. To reset your PIN follow the directions in Updating PIN in the WhatsApp Business Platform Cloud API Reference.

nested_params.name: dataLocalizationRegion
nested_params.description: The two letter ISO region for the location of where Meta will store data.

nested_params.name: tags
nested_params.description: An array of key and value pair tags.

nested_params.name: phoneNumberParent
nested_params.description: Used to add a new phone number to an existing WhatsApp Business Account. This field can't be used when the waba field is present.

nested_params.name: waba
nested_params.description: Used to create a new WhatsApp Business Account and add a phone number. This field can't be used when the phoneNumberParent field is present.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The ID of the linked WhatsApp Business Account, formatted as waba-01234567890123456789012345678901.

nested_params.name: eventDestinations
nested_params.description: The event destinations for the linked WhatsApp Business Account.

nested_params.name: eventDestinationArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the event destination.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to import phone numbers and write events.

nested_params.name: tags
nested_params.description: An array of key and value pair tags.

nested_items.name: associateInProgressToken
nested_items.description: An Amazon Web Services access token generated by WhatsAppSignupCallback and used by WhatsAppSetupFinalization.

nested_items.name: linkedAccountsWithIncompleteSetup
nested_items.description: A LinkedWhatsAppBusinessAccountIdMetaData object map containing the details of any WhatsAppBusiness accounts that have incomplete setup.

nested_items.name: registrationStatus
nested_items.description: The registration status of the linked WhatsApp Business Account.

nested_items.name: unregisteredWhatsAppPhoneNumbers
nested_items.description: The details for unregistered WhatsApp phone numbers.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the WhatsApp phone number.

nested_items.name: phoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number for sending WhatsApp.

nested_items.name: phoneNumberId
nested_items.description: The phone number ID. Phone number identifiers are formatted as phone-number-id-01234567890123456789012345678901.

nested_items.name: metaPhoneNumberId
nested_items.description: The phone number ID from Meta.

nested_items.name: displayPhoneNumberName
nested_items.description: The display name for this phone number.

nested_items.name: displayPhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number that appears in the recipients display.

nested_items.name: qualityRating
nested_items.description: The quality rating of the phone number.

nested_items.name: wabaId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the WhatsApp Business Account ID.

nested_items.name: statusCode
nested_items.description: The status code for the response.
